Plot Network Graph of Omics-Exposure Associations

plot_network.Rd

Visualizes a tidygraph network stored in the MultiAssayExperiment metadata using ggraph.

Usage

plot_network(
  expomicset,
  network = c("degs", "omics", "factors", "exposures"),
  include_stats = TRUE,
  nodes_to_include = NULL,
  centrality_thresh = NULL,
  top_n_nodes = NULL,
  cor_thresh = NULL,
  label = FALSE,
  label_top_n = 5,
  nodes_to_label = NULL,
  facet_var = NULL,
  foreground = "steelblue",
  fg_text_colour = "grey25",
  node_colors = NULL,
  node_color_var = NULL,
  alpha = 0.5,
  size_lab = "Centrality",
  color_lab = "Group"
)

Arguments

expomicset

A MultiAssayExperiment object containing network metadata (e.g., "omics_exposure_network").

network

A character string specifying which network to plot. Options are:

"omics_exposure_network"

The full correlation network.

"omics_exposure_deg_network"

Subset of the network for DEGs.

"omics_exposure_factor_network"

Subset of the network involving factor features.

include_stats

Logical; whether to compute and visualize centrality statistics. Default is TRUE.

nodes_to_include

A character vector of node names to retain. If NULL, include all nodes.

centrality_thresh

Numeric threshold to retain only nodes above a minimum centrality value.

top_n_nodes

Integer; retain only the top N most central nodes.

cor_thresh

Numeric; threshold for filtering edges by absolute correlation.

label

Logical; whether to display node labels. Default is FALSE.

label_top_n

Integer; number of top central nodes to label if label = TRUE and nodes_to_label is NULL. Default is 5.

nodes_to_label

A character vector of node names to label. Overrides label_top_n if provided.

facet_var

Optional column name (in the node data) to use for faceting the layout.

foreground

Color of the label highlight. Default is "steelblue".

fg_text_colour

Text color for node labels. Default is "grey25".

node_colors

Optional named vector for manually setting node colors by group.

node_color_var

A column name in node metadata used for color mapping (e.g., "type" or "category").

alpha

Transparency for nodes. Default is 0.5.

size_lab

Label for the node size legend. Default is "Centrality".

color_lab

Label for the node color legend. Default is "Group".

Value

A ggraph object for plotting.

Details

This function:

  • Selects a stored network from metadata(expomicset).

  • Applies optional node and edge filters (e.g., correlation threshold, centrality, node list).

  • Prunes unconnected nodes (nodes not involved in any remaining edges).

  • Computes node centrality for sizing or filtering if requested.

  • Generates a ggraph layout using .build_ggraph_plot().

Node color and label aesthetics are customizable. Labeling can be automatic (e.g., top 5 by centrality) or manual via nodes_to_label.

Examples

if (FALSE) { # \dontrun{
plot_network(
  expomicset,
  network = "omics_exposure_network",
  cor_thresh = 0.4,
  top_n_nodes = 100,
  label = TRUE
)
} # }
